remarks: A quick proof skeleton to show that the numbers less than 25 are prime, by trial division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
statement:
prmlem1.n $e |- N e. NN $.
prmlem1.gt $e |- 1 < N $.
prmlem1.2 $e |- -. 2 || N $.
prmlem1.3 $e |- -. 3 || N $.
prmlem1a.x $e |- ( ( -. 2 || 5 /\ x e. ( ZZ>= ` 5 ) ) -> ( ( x e. ( Prime \ { 2 } ) /\ ( x ^ 2 ) <_ N ) -> -. x || N ) ) $.
prmlem1a $p |- N e. Prime $.
$d N x $.
